name: Dippy Ducks
description:
A game made for Global Game Jam by team Underduck.

A smooth and soothing game about playing with a collection of rubber ducks.

Throw ducks at crates, expand your duck collection, and get lost in a whimsical sea of calm colours and quacking.

CONTROLS

  • Click and drag on a duck to throw it in the target direction
  • Throw ducks at crates to destroy them
  • If you have at least three ducks near each other, tap the "boom" icon to send them all flying off at high speeds, breaking through all crates in their way
Team

Stoil Stoichev - Design, programming, audio mixing

Ben Wells - Design, programming, art
